entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 March 2023
